Trade/Device Name(s): DIACHEX* DETERMINE Blood Glucose Monitoring System
DIACHEX* INFINITY Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for DIACHEX* DETERMINE and DIACHEX* INFINITY Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement using electrochemical biosensor technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm, for over-the-counter home use by persons with diabetes or clinical use by healthcare professionals, as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for neonatal testing.
